Title: Low Self Esteem City
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Piper Kerman (book), Sian Heder (story editor), Lauren Morelli (story editor), Nick Jones (story editor), Nick Jones
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: A bathroom turf war sees deeper lines drawn in the sand as Gloria and Vee go head to head. Piper receives devastating news.
